alert.note: Alert for Marion (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 8:40PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Marion County through 915 PM EDT... At 840 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was centered just south of Oakland, or 7 miles north of Buena Vista, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Marion Estates, Oakland and Tazewell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
